overview: The citizens of Gothum City are under attack by smut filmmakers and only one hero can help - Bat Pussy. She hangs out in her secret headquarters (aka an outhouse) and when her "twat begins to twitch," warning her of imminent crime, Bat Pussy hops on her Holy Hippity-Hop to foil the grotesque sex schemes of unhappily married couple Buddy and Sam.—Anonymous
tagline: “Here Comes... Bat Pussy: Everyone's Favorite Bouncing & Balling Crime Fighter!”
title: Bat Pussy
